verses.name: Zechariah 8:1
verses.text: Again the word of the Lord of hosts came to me, saying,

verses.name: Zechariah 8:2
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; I was jealous for Zion with great jealousy, and I was jealous for her with great fury.

verses.name: Zechariah 8:3
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; I am returned unto Zion, and will dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and Jerusalem shall be called a city of truth; and the mountain of the Lord of hosts the holy mountain.
